name: Gently Down The Stream
description:
N.B. web build not currently loading (for me) please download the Windows version instead.

Ride a boat down the stream.

  •  As time passes the boat travels faster.
  • Controls
    • mouse to interact with menu (menu may not work outside of full screen)
    • a/d to steer
    • w/s to move forwards/backwards (requires upgrade from the shop)
  • You take damage from colliding with the sides.
  • Collect coins and gain bonus coins the longer you last.
    • Use coins to upgrade your boat
      • Better Rudder - improve steering (a/d)
      • More Health - take more damage before your boat is destroyed
      • Oars - enable/improve forward/backward speed (w/s )
